about_the_game: Soul of Y is an RPG centered on soul exploration and combat, where players take on the role of a wanderer who has lost his memories and searches for the truth about the “Soul of Y” in a broken world. The game is set in a semi-open world, allowing players to freely explore ruins, unlock hidden plots, and speak with souls from different camps to influence the fate of the world. The battle system combines a turn-based system with action point mechanics, where players need to strategically allocate skills and resources to control the pace of the battle. By collecting soul fragments, players can also unlock unique abilities that allow the character to grow and gradually uncover their past.
